itunes:summary:
Former Navy SEAL Mike Ritland discusses his new book, 'Unfuck America: A Respectful, Open-Minded Conversation', how to actually get American society back on track, the search for Brian Laundrie and how the dogs he trains would track him, bungling the Afghanistan withdrawal, and what a disgrace General Milley has become.
